sourcesContent:
<!-- email-sender.component.html -->
<form #emailForm="ngForm" (ngSubmit)="sendEmail(emailForm)">
    <input type="email" ngModel name="to" placeholder="Destinataire" required>
    <input type="text" ngModel name="subject" placeholder="Sujet" required>
    <textarea ngModel name="content" placeholder="Contenu" required></textarea>
    <button type="submit">Envoyer</button>
  </form>
